class_notes: "An intensive introduction to the fundamentals of Attic Greek grammar and syntax. Students will learn to read and interpret works in classical Greek in one semester. Equivalent to Greek 101 and 102."
course_description: An intensive introduction to the fundamentals of classical Greek grammar and syntax. Students will attain as rapidly as possible the ability to read and interpret ancient works in Attic Greek. Equivalent to Greek 101 and 102.
